unexpected_error: There was a problem processing the request. Please try again.
we_cannot_find_the_page_you_are_looking_: We can’t find the page you’re looking for.
create_instance_name_helper_text: Must start with a letter and end with a letter or number. Valid characters include lowercase letters from a to z, numbers from 0 to 9, and hyphens ( - ).
generate_credential_step1_title_descript: To connect securely to Red Hat OpenShift Streams for Apache Kafka, your application or tool needs an API key with permission to access the Kafka instance and resources such as topics.
credential_aplication_reason_form_label: What do you want your application to do?
generate_credential_step2_title_descript: Choose which topics the credential can access
credential_rule_popover_data: This control is not functional for this prototype.
generate_credential_step3_title_descript: Choose which consumer groups the credential can access
generate_credential_step4_title_descript: Choose which transaction IDs the credential can access
connect_to_the_kafka_instance_using_this: Connect to the Kafka instance using this client ID and secret
create_service_account_credentials_warni: The client ID and secret won't appear again after closing this screen, so make a copy of each to store in a safe place.
client_id_confirmation_checkbox_label: I have copied the client ID and secret
drawer_resource_tab_body_description_1: To connect an application or tool to this Kafka instance, you need the address of a Kafka listener and credentials.
drawer_resource_tab_body_description_2: Your application or tool initially connects to the Kafka instance using the bootstrap server and authenticates with your service account credentials. These credentials can be used with an OAuth Client Credential Grant or as the username and password for SASL/Plain.
drawer_resource_tab_body_description_3: Applications and tools that use the REST producer API will need the REST producer endpoint to connect.
drawer_code_section_tab_body_description: Use this snippet of code to set the properties in your Kafka client to connect securely. Replace the values in
name: Name
kafka_success_message: The creation of the {{name}} Kafka instance is ready for you to create topics.
kafka_failed_message: The creation of the {{name}} Kafka instance is failed
no_permission_to_delete_kafka: Ask the Kafka instance owner or an administrator to delete this Kafka instance.
adjust_your_filters_and_try_again: Adjust your filters and try again.
max_filter_message: Maximum number of filters reached. Clear a filter before adding another.
input_field_invalid_message: Valid characters include lowercase letters from a to z, numbers from 0 to 9, and hyphens ( - ).
create_a_kafka_instance_to_get_started: To get started, create a Kafka instance.
OCM-EX-103: Synchronous action (creating kafka requests) is unsupported, use async=true parameter
MGD-SERV-API-4: User {{user}} is not authorized to access the service.
you_do_not_have_access_to_openshift_stre: You do not have access to OpenShift Streams
length_is_greater_than_expected: Kafka instance name cannot exceed {{maxLength}} characters.
the_name_already_exists_please_enter_a_u: The name {{name}} already exists. Please enter a unique name.
to_access_kafka_instances_contact_your_o: To access Kafka Instances, contact your organization administrators.

common.name: Name
common.form_invalid_alert: Please address the errors in your form to proceed
common.input_filed_invalid_helper_text: Must start with a letter and end with a letter or number. Valid characters include lowercase letters from a to z, numbers from 0 to 9, and hyphens ( - ).

serviceRegistry.welcome_empty_state_body: Store and manage artifacts, like schemas and APIs, with Service Registry. To get started, create your Service Registry.
serviceRegistry.unauthorized_empty_state_body: To set up a Service Registry, your account needs the appropriate access entitlements
serviceRegistry.tab_sample_code_title_info: Below are example configuration snippets for accessing Service Registry from different runtimes.
serviceRegistry.tab_resources_title_info: To connect an application or tool to this service registry, you will need the information below.

serviceAccount.service_accounts_title_header_info: Use service accounts to connect and authenticate your applications with Kafka instances. The service accounts that you create can access only the Kafka instances that you create.
serviceAccount.no_permission_to_delete_service_account: Ask the service account owner or an administrator to delete this account
serviceAccount.create_service_account_to_get_started: To get started, create a service account.
serviceAccount.unauthorized_access_to_service_accounts_: To access Service Accounts, contact your organization administrators.
serviceAccount.client_secret_will_be_reset: Client secret for {{serviceAccountId}} with client ID {{clientID}} will be reset.
serviceAccount.service_account_name_length_is_greater_t: Service account name cannot exceed {{maxLength}} characters.
serviceAccount.service_account_description_length_is_gr: Service account description cannot exceed {{maxLength}} characters.
